Maple Avenue Sibling Request Procedures 2025-2026 

The following information is in regard to the sibling request procedure at Maple Avenue.   

We encourage Parents/Guardians to contact us if they would like their students to be in the same spring at Maple Avenue while their children are at Maple Avenue together. We also encourage parents to let us know if they want their students separated from each other while in our building. Please note the following:  

  • Sibling requests are only accepted if the sibling is going to be at Maple Avenue while there is another sibling also at Maple Avenue (Note: the policy is not for when a student is going into the high school and there is a sibling coming in from elementary – these requests are not able to be honored) 
  • Requests for twins, triplets, and quadruplets to keep them in the same house also need to be in writing, and we will do our best to honor them. 

Important: siblings are not automatically placed in the house with their Maple Avenue siblings.  This is only done if the parent puts that request in writing. 

Please be aware that requests for specific houses will not be honored. 

To assist with this sibling request process, we would like all requests submitted in writing before June 16th.  Please know that there are occasions where requests cannot be honored for scheduling purposes.  We will contact those parents if the written request cannot be fulfilled.  Requests received after June 16th may not be honored. 

Please email or put in written form the student’s names, elementary school and the name of the older sibling. 

Requests should be sent to: 

Scott Singer, Maple Avenue Middle School Principal 

s_singer@saratogaschools.org 

Please also CC your request to: 

Joshua Muldner, School Counselor – Counseling Department Head 

j_muldner@saratogaschools.org
